text: During the 2024 summer Olympics Botswana won its first ever gold medal in the men's 200-meter race, the main runner who won is Lesile Tebogo. Letsile Tebogo also became the first African to win the 200-meter race at the Olympics,. Category:Sport in Botswana Category:2024 Summer Olympics
title: Botswana at the 2024 Summer Olympics
